course.subject: LANG
course.name: Communication for Environmental Management and Technology I
course.description: This course aims to develop studentsâ€™ competence in discipline-related English, specifically communicating topics in the field of Environmental Management and Technology to the general public. Throughout the course, environmental issues will be examined, and students will learn the necessary skills to be applied in weekly communicative tasks and individual spoken and written assessments. For EVMT students only.
course.prerequisites: LANG 1403 OR LANG 1404 OR LANG 1003 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: LSJU
reviews.title: bad grade course in the bad grade courses
reviews.comment_grading:
Never gotten such a bad grade
One single course with only two credits can pull my cga down 0.06
Very subjective assessment. Only option is to please the teacher.
Those who disagree with me should beware. You just haven't encountered a situation where you were given a low grade because of a subjective evaluation. I have asked other teachers in cle to evaluate my work in this class, more than one teacher, and no one has given me a grade as low as the one I received in this class.
